Summary: THREE WHITEYELLOW DISC FLYING NNW AT A HIGH RATE
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS OUT IN THE BACK YARD SMOKING A CIGARETTE, WITH MY DOG RUNNING IN THE BACKYARD. I WAS LOOKING TO THE SEWHEN I NOTICED THE DISC COMMING IN MY DIRECTION. ISEE AIRCRAFT ALL THE TIME GOING INTO DFW AIRPORT, AND AT NAS FT WORTH, WITHTHERE LANDING LIGHTS ON THIS WAS NO NORMAL CRAFT. I WORK FOR THE NAVY AT NAS FTWORTH, AND WORK PART TIME FOR DELTA AIRLINES,AND I CAN HONESTLY SAY THAT,WHAT ISAW WAS NOT ANY TYPE OF CRAFT THAT I HAVE SEEN BEFORE. ANYWAY THE DISC WEREFLYING IN A NNW DIRECTION AND THE INCEDENT LASTED FOR PROBABLY AROUND 10 SEC.
